Messages with photos and videos are now more compact. When you receive several files at once they ll show up in a neat grid so you can see all the attachments on one screen.
We ve put things in order by checking how well some features work and getting rid of minor problems in the code.

Send quick and fun video messages. You can select from different outlines for the video such as a christmas tree snowflake heart and others. Just tap the record icon in the chat. Show everything around you by switching cameras and using the flash while recording! To record a quick message tap and hold the button. The video will be sent as soon as you let go. Also helping lift holiday spirits are the new Ice and New Year s chat themes.

The new version is completely supported by iOS 16. We ve updated the context menu in the news feed messenger and stories. It s now more compact so it takes up less space on your screen. You can now chat with friends and loved ones using the contacts widget on the Home screen. We ve made a widget for VK Steps. Add it to your lock screen to track your activity and compete with friends. The Center Stage feature from Apple is now available in calls on compatible iPad models. It will allow you to stay in frame even if you move around. This version no longer supports iOS 12 13. Make sure that you ve installed iOS 14 or higher to continue using all VK features.

We re adding fall icons for the app and letting you know that some iOS versions will no longer be supported. The new fall icons for the app include yellow leaves a festive pumpkin and a cool violet. Choose the one you want in the appearance settings. Soon updates will only be supported on devices with iOS 14 or higher. New features and other updates won t be available on previous versions. If you haven t downloaded the latest version of iOS yet now is the time.
Add content to messages from anywhere simply by dragging it. For example tap the URL in the browser or a picture in an email and drag it to an open message in VK Messenger to attach it.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.
We made a few changes to help the app work properly.
We made a few changes to help the app work properly.

Create a unique sticker pack with your own personalized vmoji. To create your virtual avatar open any chat and tap the vmoji icon in the sticker keyboard. Choose everything from the skin tone to clothes in the constructor or leave it to the neural networks.
Your phone s gallery and camera are now close by when creating stories. You can choose right from there if you want to upload something from your device or create something new.

We ve added a watch history to My videos. Now you can easily go back to any clip you ve already watched. Live streams are also saved in the history which means you can go back to finish a match or masterclass if you missed it live. You can also start watching a film on your phone and continue on your tablet or laptop right where you left off. All you need to do is sign in through your VK ID account on these devices.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.
The bugs we found won t be bugging you anymore.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.
We ve added summer icons for the app with flowers strawberries and a stylish design. Go to the appearance settings to find one you want to set.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.

We ve added the data saving mode for watching videos. This helps preserve your battery life and reduce the data used from your internet package. You can enable this mode in the player s settings during any video. After this all videos will play with a resolution of no more than 480p including videos in the news feed. When you no longer need to save traffic you can disable the mode in the video settings and watch videos in the highest quality.

We ve introduced instant video processing technology to VK Video. Now you can watch new videos as soon as they ve been uploaded to the platform. You can be the first to see the latest news TV episodes and conferences. If you post a video yourself you ll be able to show it to viewers more quickly.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.

Discover new music with our new recommendation algorithm. It finds playlists of people whose tastes match yours. The algorithm will even show you just how similar your tastes are for example 78 85 or maybe even 98 . The more you listen the more accurately it will pick the selection for you. Go to Listen to others Hub Music and meet new tracks among those you already love.

You can now post clips short vertical videos from any community including business pages. Update the app and promote products in clips record mini lessons and unboxing videos and start challenges. Clips will be saved in your community and appear in the VK Clips news feed. They may also appear in the top and recommended videos helping you get more views.

Check the security of your account is in the updated Manage VK ID section of the side menu. The app will remind you when to change your password and give you other personalized security recommendations such as enabling 2 step verification or linking your phone number and email address. This will help keep your personal data secure and allow you to quickly restore access to your account.

Check the security of your account is in the updated Manage VK ID section of the side menu. The app will remind you when to change your password and give you other personalized security recommendations such as enabling 2 step verification or linking your phone number and email address. This will help keep your personal data secure and allow you to quickly restore access to your account.

Now you can open stories from friends and communities wherever it s convenient whether it s from posts in the news feed on the creator s page or in comments search results or other sections. Just press the profile or community picture with a blue ring which shows when someone has a new story.
We added spring app icons. Get rid of the winter blues by selecting a fresh spring icon in the Appearance section of the app settings.

New feature for phone calls: Caller ID. The app will show who s calling you and if an unknown number could be spam. Smart algorithms recognize suspicious incoming calls and check numbers using their own database of companies. The service is free and can be enabled in Settings. Chats now remember where you closed them. Next time you open them you can keep reading from the same place as long as there aren t any new messages.

Introducing the new Trending feed which will help you keep stay up to date with what the world s talking about. The feed is created using artificial intelligence which analyzes millions of posts and groups them by topic from economics to entertainment. And if you re following the Olympics take a look at the thematic Beijing 2022 feed. There you ll find videos competition results expert opinions and a medal table. You can find the new tabs at the top of your news feed next to For you .

New in the messenger: Chat archive perfect for when you want to clean up your chat list but not delete any chats. Tap or swipe the chat to the left to archive it. To see your archive swipe down on the chat list. Chat menu screen the chat menu now opens as a separate screen not a cramped pop up list. See how well the search bar notification settings attachments and more fit on the screen. Valentine s Day background add some romance to your chats with the new thematic background. You can change the background in your appearance settings or chat menu.

New in the messenger: Chat archive perfect for when you want to clean up your chat list but not delete any chats. Tap or swipe the chat to the left to archive it. To see your archive swipe down on the chat list. Chat menu screen the chat menu now opens as a separate screen not a cramped pop up list. See how well the search bar notification settings attachments and more fit on the screen. Valentine s Day background add some romance to your chats with the new thematic background. You can change the background in your appearance settings or chat menu.

Freshly updated backgrounds will make your stories even more beautiful. Now you can choose from three options: Color bright soft solid colors Design backgrounds with beautiful colorful patterns Blur your usual background but blurred
You can now change the text size in the messenger to make it easier to read or so it looks better on your screen. To increase or decrease the font size go to Settings Appearance.

Last year we became one of the first large platforms in the world to integrate the modern QUIC network protocol into our app. This protocol made content delivery speeds twice as fast decreasing the time it takes to load photos or refresh the news feed. And with today s update we re continuing to make the app more convenient to use by improving its stability.

Last year we became one of the first large platforms in the world to integrate the modern QUIC network protocol into our app. This protocol made content delivery speeds twice as fast decreasing the time it takes to load photos or refresh the news feed. And with today s update we re continuing to make the app more convenient to use by improving its stability.
We got rid of some bugs remaining from previous versions.

We ve added two useful features to the messenger: You can change the order of pinned chats. Move all your important and urgent chats to the top so you don t miss anything when planning a New Year s party or handling important tasks. To do this just tap and drag the chat to where you want it to be. Find messages by photo video or other attachment. First tap the attachment you re looking for in the chat s attachment list then tap the three dots icon and Go to Message . The chat will open to that message.

We ve got some early holiday presents for you: new app icons messenger backgrounds and an easter egg in the news feed. Choose from 12 app icons: Christmas trees with lights snowflakes caviar and herring under a fur coat the taste of New Year! . There s also the old school VKontakte logo from the 2000s. Find the one that fits your mood in Settings Appearance. Add some holiday flair to your chats with thematic backgrounds featuring snowmen and gingerbread men. You can change your background in the chat settings. Swipe down on the news feed and watch it come to life in a New Year s fashion with a dancing Persik Christmas tree and other animations.

Find songs you vibe with on VK Music! Now you can find playlists from people with similar musical tastes on the main page of the Music section. Here you ll find your tracks at the top with the Collections from users block right below. These are playlists from people on the same musical wavelength as you with similar favorite genres artists and moods. We ll find ideal matches for you among hundreds of thousands of unique playlists all so you can find your new favorite song.

There s always something interesting to watch on the updated VK Video page Hub Video . Explore a massive library of content with millions of free HD videos including films series shows sports and esports live streams. Discover something interesting in themed tabs in the For You section using our improved search feature and recommendations. Watch wherever and whenever. Videos start quickly and unstable internet connections have almost no effect on how they play.

Share the most interesting moments of videos. Now you can send video links that open to a specific frame. To do this go to VK.com on your computer choose the moment you want to send and click Copy link with timestamp in the menu. Send it to yourself or friends. On iOS the video launches from the exact point you copied the link from.
For iOS 15 we re putting faces to names. Now whenever you get a message you ll see the sender s profile picture in the push notification.

We now support iOS 15. Update the app and VK will immediately start working with the system. iPad users get the special bonus of having the largest music widget available. Add it to your home screen Widgets VK and manage your music from there. Using the widget you can easily open playlists music recommendations and recently played tracks.

Tap and hold to access quick actions: Open the app appearance menu by tapping and holding the app mode button. Here you can set the mode to change depending on the time match the iOS mode and select chat backgrounds for the messenger. Search for messages in a chat by tapping and holding the chat name. Enter a phrase you remember to find the message you re looking for even if it s a voice message. Add tracks attached to posts to your music or queue them up by tapping and holding them.

Introducing the new universal app for iPhone and iPad. Now music video calls clips and other VK features are available on your tablet as well. Update the app and bring out the big screen! Main updates for iPad: Music and notifications right in the bottom menu. Playlists and notifications are just one tap away. Stories clips and videos. And with that big screen of yours you won t miss any details. Spacious messenger. See a list of your chats on the left and write messages on the right. You can hook up your external keyboard and type out long detailed messages or if you re rushed for time just send a voice message. Video calls for work study and casual chatting. See everyone and everything on the big screen!

Introducing updates to Stories and Messenger. Now you can add up to a hundred stories to a narrative. They ll be displayed on your profile and won t disappear after 24 hours. Go ahead and share all of the most amazing stories from your vacation. Voice messages of up to 30 minutes can now be transcribed. Now when you don t have time to listen to a large voice message you can just read it. This also makes it easier to find the message by searching for any word in its text.

Now you ll be able to see if someone is trying to send you a photo or video just like with text and voice messages. There will no longer be any awkward silences while files are uploading. It was time to do some spring cleaning so the first things we threw out of course were some bugs.

Now you can edit voice messages. Did background noise mess up the transcription It s easy to fix! Just open the transcription press and hold it to open the menu and select Edit text. You can edit the transcription within 24 hours of sending the voice message.

Notifications about people leaving old chats won t bother you anymore. An automatic message will still appear in the chat when someone leaves but the number of unread messages won t increase and the chat won t move up in your chat list. This applies to chats with more than 10 members or ones that no one has written in for at least a week.

Snowflakes melt fast but not the ones on our icon! Update the app and enjoy a bit of winter magic every time you see them. Ring in the New Year with funny predictions and end of the year statistics. And don t forget to wish your loved ones happy holidays on VK!

Meet the newest addition to thematic feeds: a tab for football fans. Here you can find the latest news straight from the stadiums live streams of matches expert analysis and comments from official club and team communities. You can scroll through it or check out other thematic feeds on topics such as science travel or movies. All you have to do is go to the News tab and start swiping left until you reach the feed you want.

New features have been added to the VK Health platform. Now you can record what you eat and keep track of symptoms if you re not feeling well. Food Diary Log your meals and this service will break down how many calories and macronutrients such as fat carbs or protein you re consuming. Symptom Tracker If you feel sick start keeping track of any symptoms you have such as a fever loss of smell or cough. All symptoms are displayed in the service s calendar giving your doctor the full picture of the illness and when it started.

Now you can send voice messages up to an hour long giving you plenty of time to tell others about your day or get some ideas off your chest.

Now you can choose whether you want chat members names to come from their VK profiles or your phone s contact list. Just sync your contacts or enable the option in your settings. That way if you have your friend as Platypus on your phone they ll show up that way on VK too.

The Messages section is now Messenger. This new name more accurately reflects the service s features as it s not only used to send messages but make calls transfer money and share music photos videos and documents as well. Added new familiar messenger features: Chat with people from your phone s contacts on VK by syncing them with the app. Add custom backgrounds to chats. Choose one of the default ones or upload an image.

Two major updates: we ve added support for iOS 14 and launched VK Health. The VK Health platform will help you learn more about your body and start developing good habits. And your friends can help! Ask them for support compete share your achievements and reach your goals together. The platform can encourage you to quit smoking remind you to take your medicine and give you tips on how to relieve stress through breathing exercises. More features and expert advice will be gradually added to VK Health. For example you ll soon have access to a leaderboard displaying the number of steps you and your friends have taken with steps counted through synchronization with Apple Health. Go out and see who can walk the most!

Add stickers to your favorites Tired of constantly scrolling to find that one sticker you always use Tap and hold it to open a menu where you can save the sticker to your favorites. Do you ever find multiple QR codes right next to each other Now you don t have to bring your phone closer or adjust your camera s focus to scan one of them. Just open your QR Scanner in the app camera and tap the code you want after it s detected.

We made it possible to search for chat members and messages right in your chats. This feature works even if you have a slow internet connection. We updated our QR code scanner. Now it can recognize QR codes in photos that you have on your device. You can open the scanner from your story camera or in the second tab in the bottom menu. The app has been adapted to iOS 13. For example if you enable dark mode in your phone settings it is automatically applied on VK.

Customize comment order Newest oldest or most interesting if a post has more than 10 comments you can choose how you want to see them. Listen to voice messages offline Voice messages load automatically. Now you can listen to them even with a poor connection.

Fully immerse yourself in voice messages. Just open a chat hold your phone up to your ear and voice messages will start playing one after the other. If you haven t listened to a message yet there ll be a blue dot by the play button to let you know.

QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds you can share links to interesting communities profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town. If you see a QR code use the in app camera s new QR scanner function to scan it. We ve added easy access to the scanner at the top of both the Recommendations and Friends sections. On the app you ll be able to create QR codes for your profile or posts as well.

QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds you can share links to interesting communities profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town. If you see a QR code use the in app camera s new QR scanner function to scan it. We ve added easy access to the scanner at the top of both the Recommendations and Friends sections. On the app you ll be able to create QR codes for your profile or posts as well.

Listen to voice messages in a new player Now you can listen to messages and use other sections of the app at the same time. You can also adjust their playback speed and if you received several messages they ll play automatically one after the other. Keep order in your chats Chat administrators can now delete other members messages. As before messages from chat creators or other administrators can t be deleted.

Share interesting content with one tap Share photos videos and much more by tapping the share icon and selecting which chats you want to send them to. Get a sneak peek of the chat with 3D Touch Pressing on a chat name a bit harder than usual will allow you to see the last few messages without opening the chat.

Easily free up space on your phone by using the new Clear cache function in Settings. Photos from messages and the news feed are cached which allows them to appear instantly. Sometimes though free space is what really matters.

Bug fixes
We re continuing to improve the stability of our services. Adapted the app for iPhone XS Max.

Enjoy watching videos in the updated player The video player is now more beautiful and easy to use. Fast forward or rewind by double tapping on the right or left sides of the screen adjust the video speed and enable full screen mode with one gesture. The player now supports subtitles and provides video recommendations. Find friends without opening the app Just type your friend s name into the search field on your phone s home screen to find their VK profile quickly and easily. VK on iOS 12 Adapted the app to the updated operating system.

The player now supports subtitles and provides video recommendations. Find friends without opening the app Just type your friend s name into the search field on your phone s home screen to find their VK profile quickly and easily. VK on iOS 12 Adapted the app to the updated operating system.

Talk to your friends face to face Now it s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What s more thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation you can now turn your phone whichever way you d like during video calls. Send stories to chats Create a story and tap Choose recipients . There used to only be a list of friends but now there are group chats as well.

Talk to your friends face to face Now it s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What s more thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation you can now turn your phone whichever way you d like during video calls. Send stories to chats Create a story and tap Choose recipients . There used to only be a list of friends but now there are group chats as well.
Bug fixes
Find out the most important information about a public page in a matter of seconds. Updated the design of the screen containing the community s main information and description.

Share photos faster. Send pics to your friends or post them on your community without tiring your fingers out. The Share button is right there when looking at your pictures. Have all new messages right at hand. Tap Messages and choose Unread to see your unread chats on one screen. Send stickers to friends. Sometimes stickers speak louder than words. Express yourself with ease! Stickers now load even quicker.
We re continuing to improve the stability of our services.
We re continuing to improve the stability of our services.

Pin messages in chats. Chat members will never miss important information such as useful links meeting places and travel times. Send chat invite links. Users who started a conversation can copy a unique chat invitation link in the chat info section. Instantly create a group chat for you and your colleagues classmates or friends. Minimize calls during the conversation. You can use all of the app s functions such as messaging browsing communities or checking your news feed all while carrying on a call. Search communities for posts. No bit of news will be left behind. Did you suddenly remember an interesting post and want to show it to your friends Now you can go to the community you remember seeing it in and find it by searching some key words. Track your profile statistics. If you have over 100 followers you ll be able to find out general information about the sex age and location of your page s visitors. You ll also be able to see their activity such as the number of likes or comments.

Polls 2.0 Eye catching and easy to use with a bunch of new features. Add a colored background to make your poll unique and noticeable. Choose from the pictures offered or upload one yourself. Set up multiple answer questions and get the most accurate results from your poll. Create polls directly in chats. You and your friends can now vote right in your group chat on where to meet up on the weekend or what film to watch tomorrow night. Specify how long the poll lasts. When the time is up no one else can participate or change their vote. Ideal for contests. Receive notifications when friends take part in your poll and instantly find out the results when voting is over.

Mention friends in chats. Just type in your message and select the person you need from the list of chat members. When you send your message that person will receive an instant notification about it. Open specific messages right from chat search results. You can now easily bring up a conversation thread or find out how your question was answered. Search in a new way! We updated the search function in the app s Discover section to make finding friends communities or news more convenient. You might find exactly what you re looking for right in the suggestions we provide. Publish your favorite photos and videos in stories. Whether you took them today a week ago or even earlier time is no longer a factor. Your friends won t miss your beautiful vacation pics or that funny video you took when you went out last weekend. Disable comments on specific posts. There are times when you want to share important news with the world but are not in the mood to read through comments. Now you can simply disable comments when making a post.

Bug fixes

Edit messages Did you make a clumsy typo Don t worry everyone makes mistakes. Correct your misspellings and let others be none the wiser. If anyone in the chat edits their message the word edited will appear next to it. Watch videos on Apple TV. Big screens big impressions. Stream videos from the VK player to Apple TV using AirPlay. Watch your favorite clips and live streams right on the TV. Collect money for group purchases. Now in private conversations and chats you can create money transfers to buy your friend a present or chip in for the bill at a cafe. It s as easy as sending a message.

Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them. Added a convenient way to get to VK from other applications. When you tap on a VK link the desired section will open in the app. Completely changed the text editor in Stories. You can now use new fonts and colors backgrounds for your text fast alignment and a slider to adjust the font size. Integrated quick rewind and fast forward functions into the videos in the news feed. If you tap twice on the left or right sides of the video player screen the video will jump 10 seconds back or forward.

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Improved notifications. Now you can immediately respond to notifications within the app. For example you can reply to a message or accept a friend request. If the notifications are viewed on the computer they will disappear from your phone

Improved notifications. Now you can immediately respond to notifications within the app. For example you can reply to a message or accept a friend request. If the notifications are viewed on the computer they will disappear from your phone

We ve added the ability to report pages. Now you can submit complaints against pages that distribute spam or violate other rules. We review all reports immediately upon reception to ensure that VK is comfortable to use. You can now send VK invitations. Invite your friends to register on VK via a special link created in the Find Friends section.
Improvements and bug fixes

Added support for mobile AMP so that you can read articles with ease with reduced data usage. Instantly download news items and pages of external sites that use this technology such links are marked with a lightning badge. New document search. Quickly find what you need when searching your personal files and other documents. Implemented dozens of improvements and prepared the application for important future updates.

A new screen for viewing live streams: instantly comment and subscribe to streamers send stickers and gifts watch interesting streams from provided suggestions. Support has never been closer as now you can get help using the mobile app s new section. We ve added answers to popular questions as well as the ability to restore profile. If the list doesn t include a certain question just send it to our agents.
Improvements and bug fixes

The music player now has a brand new look. It s fast stable and looks fresh and new. We ve added smoother animations the ability to swipe between playlists as well as share songs on both your wall and in a private message. We ve updated our masks to make them easier to use. There are dozens of different looks to choose from. Add one to your story to bring it to life. You ll have all the masks on hand. The app has been adapted for iPhone X.
Improvements and bug fixes

It s time to try something completely new! Meet the most massive update in the last 3 years: New menu: Switch between news messages notifications and search with one tap. Improved search and suggestions: Find posts videos live streams communities and pages which might be specifically interesting to you. Notifications: All alerts and friend requests can now be found on one screen.
Improvements and bug fixes
Improvements and bug fixes

Comments on behalf of communities have come to a new level! Administrators can write public comments and reply to a user in their communities as well as in any other posts. This service is enabled in the Account section of the app settings.

Meet VK Masks your fresh look every day! Choose Masks in Stories select the one you like and share the photo or the video with your friends. New masks are painted every day by enthusiasts and artists from all over the world. If you want to create a mask yourself check out the official VK Masks community: vk.com vkmasks

Meet VK Masks your fresh look every day! Choose Masks in Stories select the one you like and share the photo or the video with your friends. New masks are painted every day by enthusiasts and artists from all over the world. If you want to create a mask yourself check out the official VK Masks community: vk.com vkmasks

Sometimes all you need is one reason to update an app and here it is new Music! The update includes: Playlists Create music collections from an unlimited assortment of tracks. Share and update them follow playlists of friends communities and celebrities. Recommendations Using your preferences our algorithms will select interesting music belonging to friends and thousands of music communities.

Improved notifications in iOS 10 Cover photos in communities New graffiti tools
Improvements and bug fixes

Videos in the newsfeed are now played automatically Tap to unmute. You can disable autoplay in settings. Apps in communities Reserve a time for haircut buy concert tickets or perform other actions directly from a community page. Photo Widget Discover your friends recent photos. Shortcut actions on the Home Screen 3D Touch support required.

Voice Messages Press the microphone to start recording. Release to send. It s easier than to type a long message. Money Transfers Attach money to a message using your payment card. The recipient s card number is not required they can choose a card for transferring money to. Posts now have interesting comments and friends activity shown below. New graffiti features: transparency and eraser. Graffiti can now be sent in comments as well.
Bug fixes
You can now draw graffiti in messages. New interface makes sharing attachments in messages and comments easier.

Friends photos and other sections are now available in the News title menu. Previously in 2.7: Interesting First mode for your news feed. All posts remain in the feed but the most interesting ones are shown above the others. Use News settings to enable it. Animated GIFs can now be viewed in your news feed saved to documents and shared with friends. Matching stickers will appear when you type an emoji or some words in messages and comments.

Interesting First mode for your news feed. All posts remain in the feed but the most interesting ones are shown above the others. Use News settings to enable it. Animated GIFs can now be viewed in your news feed saved to documents and shared with friends. Matching stickers will appear when you type an emoji or some words in messages and comments.
VK Products. Now you can easily find choose and purchase products you need in community stores. View of attachments in conversations. Photos links and other files from your chats are on hand.

Updated News. No need to refresh the feed: new posts are added automatically. Links and polls became more noticeable with better look in previews. New friends recommendations. People you may be interested in are shown in your news feed. Updated Games. Less notifications and more frequent catalog refreshment for you.

Bug fixes Early in version 2.4: Share photos links and other documents from any app via the system share menu Gifts service send gifts to your friends and loved ones on special days or just keep up their spirits Now you can reply to a message directly from the system notification Stickers and gifts are paid with a universal currency VK votes Support for iOS 9 and other improvements

Share photos links and other documents from any app via the system share menu Gifts service send gifts to your friends and loved ones on special days or just keep up their spirits Now you can reply to a message directly from the system notification Stickers and gifts are paid with a universal currency VK votes Support for iOS 9 and other improvements
Subscribe to new posts notifications on users and communities pages Extended privacy settings New types of notifications added Managing your account
Minor improvements and bug fixes

We have added support for iOS 8 iPhone 6 and 6 Plus. We have also added plenty of new features and made lots of improvements. Unfortunately we had to disable the music service in the app. We are making every effort to restore music features in the next versions of VK app. Stickers update new packs in the store stickers in comments a preview feature and choosing from recent ones Advanced users search option added in the left menu Now you can edit your profile use the menu on your page You can quickly pick a recent photo to send in Messages Search for new friends from contacts Facebook Twitter or Gmail Now you can quickly add a person nearby to friends You can pin an important post on the wall to make it more visible Videos uploaded by users or groups as well as video albums are now represented in separate lists

Stickers are now available in the iPhone app. It s a free and handy way to express your feelings when you are short of words. New sticker characters created by independent artists from around the world will be added every month. The update includes and lets: view and edit current playlist add and edit scheduled posts create and edit polls suggest news on public pages see when friends are online via mobile devices answer comments in discussions new Feedback interface displaying a song s cover on the lock screen authorization support for VK SDK many other improvements and bug fixes.
VK App has been updated with an all new design for iOS7
bug fixes
You can now upload photos from your iPhone s albums Fixed message for restricted photos access on iOS 5 Other improvements and bugfixes

New photo uploading interface select upload and edit multiple photos at once. Autoimprovement and rotation for photos. Media attachments in comments. Multiple messages forwarding. Group chat avatars support. Posts and comments editing. Blacklist support block a user from their profile or via Settings. Preview mode for articles. Change attachments order in new posts or messages. New interface for external links with landscape mode support. Uncompressed photos and videos can be attached as documents to new posts and messages. Any photos may be added to Saved photos . Pinned posts friends only posts support. Ticks for verified users and communities. Photo stream shows photos from all friends regardless of the newsfeed filter. Multiple minor improvements and fixes.

Fixes for problems with photo uploads and other errors. All new photo editor with filters! Improved interface for message attachments. Bug fixes.
Fixed issue with background audio interrupted when app is open Restore access to blocked account requiring user verification

Landscape mode support for private messages and new wall posts Detailed push notifications settings: new messages requests mentions and replies Notification settings for individual multichats Recommended news section Added support for albums attached to wall posts View list of users who liked a comment Community photos added to the photo feed Toggle compression for photo uploads improved photo quality Added support for Ukrainian language Fixed issue with app crashing in the messages section increased stability while sending messages Increased stability for audio playback Over 50 bugs fixed
New emoticons Swipe to delete conversation Toggle display message text in push notifications Fade in photo animation in newsfeed Fixed critical bugs

Now posts have a view counter. New features in voice messages: Raise device to your ear to start recording or switch to private mode during playback Slide the message to rewind Updated Stories: Friends stories are now available on their profiles You can hide boring sources from stories Control privacy of your own stories If there is music playing on your device this piece of track will appear in your story
